channel.title: sublime on budRich.github.io - Boiling rice in coffe
channel.description: Recent content in sublime on budRich.github.io - Boiling rice in coffe

item.title: sublime
item.description: sublime - Run or raise a sublime instance. SYNOPSIS sublime [-v|-h|] [-i SUBLIME_INSTANCE] DESCRIPTION This command is just a shortcut to a complex command used to run or raise sublime with a certain project and instance name. OPTIONS -v Show version and exit. -h Show help and exit. -i SUBLIME_INSTANCE Instance name to give the notes window. Defautlt: sublime_notes ENVIRONMENT SUBLIME_INSTANCE If non-null the will rename instance name of main window.

item.title: notes
item.description: notesshot.png notes - Run or raise a plain notes sublime instance. SYNOPSIS notes [-v|-h|] [-i NOTES_INSTANCE] DESCRIPTION This command is just a shortcut to a complex command used to run or raise a plain notes sublime instance. OPTIONS -v Show version and exit. -h Show help and exit. -i NOTES_INSTANCE Instance name to give the notes window. Defautlt: sublime_notes ENVIRONMENT SUBLIME_INSTANCE If non-null the will rename instance name of notes window.

item.title: subpro
item.description: subpro - Switch sublime projects SYNOPSIS subpro [-v|-h] project-nane DESCRIPTION subpro closes the currently open project in Sublime Text and opens project-name in it’s place. OPTIONS -v Show version and exit. -h Show help and exit. FILES SUBLIME_PROJECTS_DIR Folder containing .sublime-project files defaults to: ~/tmp/kortisar/sublime/projects DEPENDENCIES SublimeText

item.title: subtit
item.description: subtit - Output the currently open file in sublime. SYNOPSIS subtit [-v|-h|-l] DESCRIPTION subtit uses i3get to get the window title of Sublime Text. It extracts the filename from the title and prints it to stdout. If -l flag is passed subtit will follow symbolic links if any and print the source file. OPTIONS -v Show version and exit. -h Show help and exit. -l Follow symbolic links. -i SUBLIME_INSTANCE
